description: Detective Pedro Ramirez has been released from prison to solve the kidnapping of three children, sons of a former Minister of Justice. Over the days this asingment will become a personal challenge. Ramírez will become suspicious of the entire police force... even his best friend.

title: The Spit, the Stunts, the Sex, the Gore: Behind the Scenes of 'Patrick'
originalTitle: The Spit, the Stunts, the Sex & the Gore: Behind the Scenes of Patrick

title: Venial
description: Haunted by her husband's death in WWII, Claire lives in a dark mansion, where her children begin to see supernatural visions of the undead. Is dad being conjured from the afterlife, or are the ghosts something far more sinister?

title: Murder Junkie
description: To overcome his heroin addiction, a writer begins his newest novel, about a man who becomes addicted to killing people. But the more he writes, the more he is consumed by his own creation and soon blurs the line between fiction and reality.

title: Los Ángeles
description: Mateo prepares to migrate to Los Angeles in order to support his humble family in their small Zapotec village in southern Mexico, yet before he can depart the leader of the local gang demands that he commits murder to become a member.

title: The Real Deal
description: Just days away from graduation a group of seniors at Arrupe High School join the world in experiencing a major media takeover by a group calling themselves 'The Real Deal.' The takeover lasts an hour and during that time The Real Deal broadcasts images and facts via every media outlet available, including cell phones, television, radio, and computers. These facts, disturbing but true, challenge people to act. Some of the students are unphased by the media jolt, others are more deeply affected by The Real Deal and begin a journey towards self-discovery and growth leading up to and following their commencement into the real world.

title: The Lurker
description: The Lurker tells the story of Mohannad, who decided to lurk inside the thugs and pro-Mubarak groups to know their plans to attack the revolutionary demonstrations against the military regime using hidden cameras.

title: Qui de loin semblent des mouches
description: A complicated love story between two resurrected hitmen/women on the run and their struggle against the omnipotent and paranoid corporation that created them.

title: Bristel Goodman
description: In December 2006, the first Bristel Goodman video appeared online. Within months it went viral, garnering nearly four million views and spontaneously spawning one of the longest running Alternate Reality Games in the world. It is still going on. Bristel Goodman is a uniquely stylish thriller that uses the language of new media to create an enhanced narrative experience. An Internet phenomenon that has come to life as a feature film, Bristel Goodman represents the dawning of trans-media cinema.

title: Kingdom
description: A film about a gangster's deadly journey.

title: Todos tus secretos
description: I hope my best friends never know what I think of them.

title: The Bloody Bones
description: Two small town sickos blinded by a misunderstanding from their poor, local struggling church set out to punish five sinners.

title: Bloated Minds
description: U.S forces, a marine corp, u.s army and a navy pilot who went through hell in the middle east. Only to come home to face adversity.

title: Chypre
description: Chypre is a story that focuses on a couples problem with a hint of fragrance. How a middle class wife who is ignored by her husband finds herself interested in a fellow train commuter.

title: I Corsari
description: Three old friends meet occasionally, after 20 years, and decide to rob a bank together as they are all in deep economical troubles. Then, things start going wrong and they lose hold of the reins.

title: Adiyum Andamum
description: Karan is an orphan. He was brought up by his uncle who gives him the best education, and becomes a psychiatrist. Karan loves his job and loves to help people. He goes on a professional trip to a medical institution where he turns out to be the lecturer and psychiatrist. He sees things he doesn't understand. The strange occurrences intensify and even become hostile.

title: The Writer's Block
description: A writer struggles to write a single word and has to figure how to overcome his problem so he can write again.

title: Master of Minds
description: Andy, a young woman is about to join a Game. The price a Million dollars to win or to lose her liver. All she has to do is to stay in a room with a complete stranger for 6 hours. As the walls come closer Andy's past seems to be catching up with her and a choice will have to be made whether her path will lead to forgiveness or revenge.

title: Oddrisho Shotru
description: Retired Officer Masood's past comes back to haunt him when his daughter is kidnapped by an unknown individual. He has only 24 hours to figure out the identity of the kidnapper and retrieve his daughter back, before its too late.

title: Targeting
description: A female soldier returns from Afghanistan and begins running surveillance on an Afghan person-of-interest that she learns is living in her hometown.

title: Nue mian ren zhi Si ling mian mo
description: A creepy diary is found in a haunted house all the way down in the village, which finally uncover a shaking conspiracy of the dust five years.

title: The Call
description: A roadside call turns life-threatening when the caller receives an anonymous call from the pay phone.

title: Huesos Rotos
description: Manuel González a victim of human rights make an emotional journey to the past to complete the circle of life visiting his hometown Tomé, in Chile.

title: Outlast Whistleblower Playthrough
description: Combination of the series of Markiplier's "Outlast" playthrough.

title: Der Spalt
description: Alex is human. Alex was assigned to the male gender at birth. She knows that this assignment was wrong. In a world she's living, she doesn't exist. Bodies are normed, people are squared, society hypnotised. The people do not believe what they see with their own eyes. Somewhere in the middle of concrete. All buildings look the same. Alex and her job-seeking mother share a small flat in a gray apartment block. A women's menage. A women's menage? Alex starts to shave her face. Both women leave the building and they split up. In front of the school a photographer stops her. His name is Christian Strange. He calls her 'Beautiful woman'. Will everything become well now?

title: Legenden Om Kaptein Dante
description: The premiere of the Norwegian Stage Musical "The Legend Of Captain Dante" filmed at Nordmøre Folkehøgskule.

title: Moreau
description: A literature scholar and hunting enthusiast obsessed with The Most Dangerous Game turns his favorite piece of fiction into a reality.

title: Candelabra
description: Art school graduate Helene moves back to Virginia Beach where the brokenhearted music scene is left in despair over a mysterious death.

title: Tamaya Ifrit
description: A cult is trying to summon the demon, who was imprisoned in a necklace by Gosha Tamaya, by sacrificing young girls. The police department manages to get a hold of the cult leader, and the commission officer takes the chain back home. Unfortunately, his sister brings the chain along when going on a holiday with her friends, where they set up a camp next to a castle; a castle where the demon was imprisoned in a long time ago.

title: Like a Colossus (the Endless Whispers Cycle)
description: Matthew Jackman has been a having a bad year. It's about to get much worse. Much, much worse.
originalTitle: Like a Colossus (The Endless Whispers Cycle)

title: Desolation
description: Two friends lose all of their money in a bad investment and turn to an old high school pal for help. He convinces them to rob a bank and hide out in the woods but that is when the real danger begins.

title: Godforsaken
description: A drug addicted criminal starts to hallucinate when he overdoses. Waking up in a room he doesn't remember going in to he slowly becomes insane.

title: Pintu Neraka
description: The story follows Kamasani, a business tycoon with terminal cancer whom seeks Mahabub, a mysterious recluse rumoured to possess a cure. After the expensive treatment Kamasani feels the cancer is reduced, but he starts having serious side effects; he hallucinates and becomes violent. The turning point comes when Vida, a TV reporter uncovers Mahabub's supernatural conspiracy that involves prominent names. Kamasani soon realizes that people have either died or suffered because of his refusal to accept his own fate and vows to set things right.

title: Shilo
description: About a young man's obsession with his childhood girlfriend and love for his father that brings him to unfamiliar and dark territory as an adult.

title: Within
description: A group of girls unleash a demonic force, after they find a cursed locket.

title: Akela the Alone
description: A loner, whose parents died years ago, lives all alone doing petty jobs for survival. He meets Nadeem and Dawood and his whole life takes a turn to insanity.

title: The Triangulation of Wong, Orlaf & Williamson
description: A thriller with a chilling/twisted ending.

title: Secret Weapon
description: Secret weapon is a story of a young family whose happiness was truncated by a series of unfortunate events. Their baby is missing and all hell is let loose.

title: Kein Entkommen
description: Kein Entkommen (No escape) for a family mother after a raid by juvenile violent offenders because she does not let go of the trauma.

title: Loofo
description: Loofo is a cross-genre hybrid, a dark comedic thriller, an always funny and quirky yet simultaneously grim satire of the 'coming of age' trope, situated in a world of mass surveillance. Loofo is a not-coming-of-age story. It centers on a young twenty-something named Loofo, a man bored with his very existence, and the trials and tribulations he goes through as he accidentally finds himself involved with an insurrectionist techno-terrorist group that is frankly pretty bad at what it's trying to do (if it can even decide what that is). Not to spoil the film, but to spoil the film, things do not turn out well. At least for the faction. Or maybe for Loofo. Or maybe for neither.

title: Twisted Tales from Sweden: A VHS Nightmare
description: "Twisted Tales from Sweden: A VHS Nightmare" was a 2014 Swedish non-hosted anthology movie of weird, terrifying, funny and bloody horror tales made in a retrospective VHS (Video Home System) mix.

title: Netru Indru
description: A team of cops is sent to the forest to capture/kill a police officer who has gone rogue.

title: Bardo
description: Algaa is a street cleaner in modern-day Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His life is turned upside down when the death of Erdentsetseg, a young mother, results in her spirit haunting him. In some schools of Tibetan Buddhism, Bardo, is the state of existence intermediate between two lives on earth. BARDO is a modern and contemporary Mongolian film produced by Idugan Entertainment and made to convey a message of spiritual awareness.

title: The 2nd Annual WVSU Student Film & Video Festival
Repayment
description: Derek Smith is a family man who has been living his life perfectly. But he gets told one day that he has to pay back his debt that he was offered years ago to help him out. To pay it back...He has to kill his own flesh and blood.

title: Annex
description: Nick and his brother Michael have always been close, but when Michael abruptly passes away, Nick's world is turned upside down. While sorting out his late brother's affairs, Nick uncovers an unknown device that Michael had been hiding. As Nick delves into the nature of the device, he learns that he is not the only one searching for answers, as death and chaos slowly consume his once normal life. What is the device - and more importantly, will Nick be alive to find out?

title: After Exodus
description: In the distant future a refugee lives in peace on an uninhabited island. A surprise arrival by those he left behind and a simple mistake compromise his situation, sending him into a nightmarish struggle to survive and keep his freedom.

title: Coward
description: Two people connect over the mutual experience of murder.

title: Game Over (the Endless Whispers Cycle)
description: A group of friends gather to seek adventure, riches and fame. They get far more than they bargained.

title: I Put My Heart Into This Film
description: Davis is a down on his luck filmmaker unable to generate interest in his script, so he invests what little money he has to buy an old camera to make the film himself; only to discover that he gets some unexpected 'help'

title: The Saklas's Last Words
description: A talented man dies without performing his greatest desire: to become a filmmaker. 80 years later, the soul manifests itself in a poor resident in a slum in Brazil, enabling him to produce a different film in the incredible world: VR, AR and neural cyberpunk universe. Alone on a computer, using computer graphics techniques.

title: Opis slike II
description: Based on Heiner Mueller's Buildbeschreibung.

title: Tick Tock Trick
description: Selik Manor draws in a group with a love of the gothic world. The visitors desire for history, ghosts and magic is excited inside. The themed hosts charm the guests in the haunted setting with words and tricks. Zuri (Bhawana Jimi) is secretly psychic and becomes aware of a dark unseen presence. They must all make their choice when to leave as time ticks by.

title: Ciudad sin sombra
description: Set in the impressive mountain and coastal scenery of the Andean region, this film tells the story of Ana helping her grandfather escape from a psychiatric hospital to fulfill his last wish.

title: Invasão
description: A group of friends decides to spend the weekend in a seclute cabin. What they didn't know is that unexpected occurrences in the world were about to begin.

title: Lost in a Moment
description: Carl loves to daydream. Can you tell the difference between your dreams and reality?

title: Patrick: Cast and Crew On-set Interviews
Elder John
description: A Young Girl Has A Visit From Two Missionaries Who Want To Convert Her To Being A Mormon. When She Is Rude To Them Everything Turns Nasty When These Two Mormons Feel Like Playing A Game Of Life And Death.

title: Cleanland
description: Born of French Creole parents, Renee Arceneux invested her entire life into her struggling security software company, Arceneux Analytics. Now she finally is about to receive the break that will make her wealthy beyond her wildest imagination. However, a lethal strategy to save an old friend from a brutal enemy threatens everything she stands for and everyone around her.

title: Water
description: Sarah Wilson, a shy bookish woman. Falls in love with Alex, a dark haired handsome stranger. Everything is going well until everyone she holds dear either disappears or dies, accept for Alex. Is her mind playing tricks on her or is Alex at the center of this terrifying mystery?

title: At All Cost
description: In 2010, an horrible event took place in the community of Saint-Joseph. The young Jessica Price went missing. A couple of weeks later, body parts were found scattered all around town, which lead the police to the conclusion that Jessica might have been horribly murdered. The murderer was never to be heard from again. Rumors spread around town that the killer filmed the horrible acts of sadism. Brian Pleasence, a close friend to Jessica decided to investigation the case. At All Cost is the testimony of a young man trying to uncover the truth about something so terrible, that common sense can't even try to describe it.

title: In der Überzahl
description: While driving to his Danish homeland, Stig has to stop briefly in a small town, then a stranger suddenly sits in his back seat and puts a gun to his head. He discovers that the uninvited passenger recently killed several students at school

title: Julia's Curse
description: When Julia comes back to France, a curse seems to have hit her family. So when Julia's daughter is accused of murder, she decides to investigate by herself.

title: Siva Senai
description: Set on the streets of East London; a young man teams up with his friends to take revenge on a group of thieves who murdered his mother.

title: Guilty
description: Sean Patterson a stockbroker finds himself in debt after a deal gone wrong after a bet against Tim Manson. He now must payback Tim or people in his life will suffer the consequences.

title: Chicago Bastards
description: A group of African-American youths come to visit their friend's home in rural Uganda, but find themselves at odds with ancestral spirits.

title: Vengeance Is a .44 Magnum
description: Christi's (Brandy Amann) life in the fast lane sends her spiraling out of control. On the run from a vicious pimp (Jaylon Hunter) and his gang of ruthless thugs, she finds herself captured, beaten and tortured but saved by a homeless war vet (Tony Jones). Milo helps her recover from the attack. Christi sets off on a path of destruction and revenge against the murderous killers with unstoppable anger and a large caliber handgun. Payback is a bitch... and Vengeance is a .44 Magnum.

title: Dont' Miss a Note: The Making of 'Grand Piano'
originalTitle: Dont' Miss a Note: The Making of Grand Piano

title: A rajzoló
description: Tamás is a talented cartoonist, who, however, does not exhibit, but is forced by the police to work as a phantom painter. His talent solves some crimes. Now he is confronted to sketch a serial rapist.

title: Blue Tide
description: A man, who once lost his love, tries to find another. The only obstacle is within himself.

title: Les nenes no haurien de jugar al futbol
My Time to Die
description: Josh feels that beating his wife is the answer to his problems. He mistreats everyone in his life, especially women, until he is kidnapped and held hostage with Eve, a woman he's never met. They try to escape, but are stalked and terrorized by the kidnapper, a mad man forcing Josh to relive his past. With time running out, Josh must put his feelings aside about women and they must work together in order to survive. Josh's salvation depends on his past, the present, and his Time to Die.

title: Ingenuity Over Technology: The Crafty Characters of the Americans
The Carbon Crooks
description: The EU's first carbon credit was put on sale in 2005. The idea was that the trading of carbon would reduce CO2 emissions and thereby curb global warming. But the system has collapsed and instead Denmark became the centre of one of the world's fastest growing scams. Experts and Europol estimate that the European treasuries lost some 10 billion EURO to hackers and VAT fraudsters from around the world. The carbon credit system has collapsed and prices have dropped by 90 percent. It has never been cheaper to pollute than today and carbon emissions have never been higher in the history of mankind.

title: Tela Blanca
description: "El Saco". The legend of a policeman who was killed by the mafia, and then came back for revenge. Some people say that his spirit is still out there, murdering criminals in cold blood, living through the fear of people. Ryan (Ismael Milano) doesn't know in what type of situation he has put himself in. Desperately in the need for money, he accepted a job from two drug-dealers, to steal cocaine from a competitor.

title: The Last Mirage
description: A thriller about the disappearance of a manuscript from the Baghdad Museum, during the US-offensive in Irak. Feat. Livingstone, a biologist + explorer, Abdallah a police officer combining fine detective flair + shrewd psychological acumen.

title: Politics and Other Crimes
description: Thomas Geer is an American journalist who comes to Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina, to make an objective report on political events and conflicts. The main actor in his report is a high-ranking official who is responsible for making an identity law. Thomas reveals too much information through his investigation on the aforementioned politicians, and revealing things that might change direction on the radical moves.

title: No One Will Hear You Scream!
The Founders' Keeper
description: Sean Johnson (Shadner Ifrene), is a member of a fraternity and a serial killer, who is killing members of his own fraternity who do not adhere to the fraternity's guidelines. He is dating the woman of his dreams, Christina (Khalimah Gaston), who is also a member of a sorority. When Sean feels Christina's love for her sorority doesn't match the love he has for his fraternity, he decides to kill her, but there is a bump along the way. During the process, he finds out she is pregnant and is now torn between keeping her alive or finishing the job.

title: The Little Match Murder Girl
description: A TV reporter investigates a local story of a ghost that causes people to spontaneously combust and its relation to a woman wronged 30 years before.

title: All Roads Lead to Occidental
description: A college boy rekindles the flame of a high school romance with a local convenience store clerk over summer break and falls into a web of crime and jealousy. The girl is married to a drug-peddling cop and entrapped by a ruthless FBI agent with the goods on her husband.

title: A Little Lie, a Little Kill
Abrakadabra
description: Following the events of Ske Din Vilje (2013) Kresten finds himself rescued by group of stoners who agree to let him stay on their couch. When money runs short, the group decides to start selling cannabis as an easy way to make money. Being a murderer, now turned drug dealer, Kresten struggles with his Christian self-image and the prospect of never returning to his spiritual guides in the church he recently joined. However, Kresten and the group of odd characters are about to discover that things are more connected than they seem.

title: A Better Lyfe
description: When a gang of thugs shoot up the neighborhood a young mother makes a decision that will change their lives forever.....inspired by actual events.

title: Grasping Mutiny
description: The world is run by a superior society. This upper society has the ability to make things called codes. The codes cause restrictions on the lower society which is broken into two groups of people. Groups are represented by color of attire. The codes can be anything from Group A can not push a door open but they can pull a door open, where group B can not pull but they can push a door. The film is about six guys who are trying to rebel against this superior society and these codes that come out every month, while at the same time a member of the superior group begins to question if what they do is just.

title: Kalam Garayed
description: The movie tackles the matter of rumors published by newspapers about celebrities, and how they affect them and their families. It tells the story of a television broadcaster who presents a famous show called "Kalam Garayed" ("Newspaper Talk") which causes her many problems because of the news she broadcasts.

title: Jimmy Was a Carpenter
description: JIMMY WAS A CARPENTER is a romantic thriller about Jimmy (Taylor Toole) who hits a major moral crossroad, when he discovers he can bring his fiancé (Jen Hirsch) back from the dead, but at what cost?

title: Sean Cloutier's Redemption
description: It's a Mystery/Thriller about a hit man whose sole purpose is to infiltrate terrorist groups. His latest assignment, a scorn televangelist, could be his last. It shares story similarities to 'La Femme Nikita' and scene sequencing of 'Pulp Fiction'.

title: Route vers nulle part
description: Route Vers Nulle Part is the story of a prostitute and what might very well be her last client.

title: The Second Coming
description: Ming and his wife Jen lead quiet ordinary lives with their 13 years old daughter Lucy, while their 20 years old son Sunny is at medical school overseas. Things seem perfect until Lucy's behavior turns bizarre from her fourteenth birthday. As Jen and Sunny struggle to decipher the cause of it all, Lucy's increasingly disturbing behavior escalates into violence. Dark and hidden secrets are unveiled one by one and the family is forced to confront their past, that deep down, they have never truly been able to forget or forgive themselves for.

title: Hunter
description: Two detectives are on the move to hunt down a serial killer who has a violent history.

title: Patient Z
description: Dr. Jack Kessler's cure for diabetes has begun to aggressively take over his body and his mind. Now he desperately needs to find a cure to his cure before it kills him or worse, escapes his research facility and kills others.

title: Cut
description: Max is a young freelance who reaches the most important scoop of his career: a set of interviews with the Young Turks, an anarchic ring. Max achieve his job with a special camera hidden in his glasses. But he starts recording whatever he sees, risking to lose himself in his obsessions. What Max doesn't foreseen is that it's own life will be the subject of one of the most controversial documentary of the last years.

title: Momentos Roubados
description: A reporter named Marcelo tries to get back into his routine and discovers he is suspected of a crime he doesn't remember having committed. Now he is on the trail of a gang that erases memories on demand. Why did they do this to him?

title: Generasjon 2.0
description: At the same day that a vicious virus attacks Stavanger, Steffens grandfather gets kidnapped. Steffen then has to battle his way through zombies, soldiers and other enemies to find him.

title: Dead Souls
description: Everyone has a story, even the dead... 'Dead Souls,' is a series of shorts that take place in a post-apocalyptic metropolitan city and follows an unlikely group of companions, as they trudge through a zombie ridden wasteland, driven to extreme lengths in order to survive. Sounds simple enough, right?

title: Musta kevät
description: After outlandish encounter with an eerie figure, young woman sees her whole world shattered. She becomes desperate to find a reason for her misery.

title: Fearless: The Documentary
description: Fearless is a daring and thought provoking documentary about a group of urban teens from Los Angeles who attempt to do the impossible, make a feature film from home. With no experience and no resources, they quickly run into trouble and must face and overcome the personal, social and economic barriers that rob many Latino youth from achieving their dreams.

title: Reporter
description: Frits is a photojournalist with a fascination for ambulances, fire trucks and police cars. His neighbour kid Johan is the only person with whom he can share his fascination. But when nine-year old Johan gets a smartphone for his birthday, he quickly starts to lose interest in Frits's long lectures about fire trucks. Frits will have to do something exceptional to seal their friendship. He will have to become a hero himself, and show the world what he's truly made of. Reporter is a film about a man lost in modern times, and his attempts to find love and recognition.

title: Nexos
description: A fantasy film about a near future in which the manipulation through TV and mass media modifies our real lives for the benefits of obscure interests.

title: The Hit
description: When Vander witnesses the murder of the love of his life, he begins slipping into a deep depression. Vander decides to end it all. However, before he ends his own life, he is offered a deal he can't refuse. One chance to relive one day in his past - will he take it or will he refuse, and at what price?

title: A Night Long Nirvana
description: "The film tries to trace and draw parallels between the lives of a locus of population in the city of Panaji,Goa. A writer obsessed with Dostoevsky and a Doctor battling with his divorce being the fulcrum around which other characters evolve. Like the various melodies and their harmonies in a symphony, these lives have common characters and circumstances. The movie tries to stage a day in the lives of these people when a "Metaphysical Conspiracy" tries to untangle the life of a principle character. inadvertently affecting others. Some will await their turn while others relish their A Night Long Nirvana."

title: Framed
description: Cameron, under house arrest for a crime he didn't commit, battles depression and sickness while seeking the person who framed him.

title: Jeff
description: An innocent man, haunted by the past, is trying to live a normal life. But with men after him, he is forced to make terrible choices in order to protect the people he loves.

title: Around the World
description: A Woman meets a Married Man in a bar. Money is exchanged. The oldest story in the world for the oldest reasons. But not tonight...

title: Callback
description: "Callback" is a film about two struggling actors Gabriel(Kalle Jogisoo) and Michael(Shannon Brown) that start using their acting skills successfully in the crime world, posing as gangsters, fake cops and so on. Will their luck run out or not?

title: No Privacy in Public
description: A series of inexplicable events leads a young journalist beyond his initial expectations of a beach side town and into the sights of the supernatural entity known as Slenderman.

title: Hitojichi no rôdokukai
description: A terrorist incident occurred in a country in South America. All six Japanese hostages died in this protracted case. It was the worst and most heartbreaking outcome. Two years later, the incident grabs attention in an unexpected way. A Japanese radio station had learned about the existence of a tape containing the voices of the hostages while they were still alive, and made it public. It was Nakahara Seiichi, a journalist with the radio station, who had received a phone call from Hirasawa Hitomi, a family member of one of the victims. According to Hitomi whose mother Sakiko was killed in the terrorist incident, the government army working to resolve the case at that time planted wiretaps and the voices of the hostages were in it. She had that audio tape in her possession and talked about wanting to know her mother's last moments. What was compiled is a "recitation of life"; daily stories of memorable events to each of the six captives of different occupations and ages. Dojima Hiroshi, an unknown writer; Takahashi Satoko, an ordinary housewife; Hirata Ryohei, a plant manager; Kuraki Shoko, a company clerk; Eto Takahiro, a tour guide; and Sakiko, a food lecturer. Nakahara was entrusted with this tape and worked hard to release it to the public.

title: A Night to Remember
description: As all of their friends come back from their first semester at college, Thomas (Thomas Sloan) and Nathan (Nathan Pelland) decide to have one last big party together. Everything seems fine until a prank the two boys pull goes wrong and all of the kids find themselves at the hands of a mysterious killer.

title: Ludo
description: Six childhood friends reunite in a castle to continue their tradition of playing hide and seek. This year they have a new recruit: Ludo, a forty-something who seems like a child, dull but mysterious.

title: The Bench
description: A man enjoys the afternoon on a park bench when he is suddenly greeted by a woman that knows everything about him, yet he doesn't recall ever meeting her in his life.

title: Project Fear
description: A class of students from an acting school is being bullied and threatened after a couple of in-school films -in which they talk privately about their worst fears- have been put online. The hunt for the perpetrators causes a lot of turmoil. Even more so when the suspicion arises that he or she or they might be class members.

title: Happy Birthday
description: Not all victims are innocent, not all villains are evil, and a good surprise is a matter of perspective. District Attorney Bernie Simmons comes home to find his wife held hostage by three armed men. He is forced to take drastic measures in order to save his wife and protect his case, and all on his birthday.

title: Iterum
description: 'Iterum' (Latin: once again, second time, to repeat) is a short psychological thriller film that centers around Ornela, an up and coming young artist, who journeys to decipher what seems to be a message from the future; she stops at nothing, even as her mind betrays her and unravel the very fabric of her reality.

title: Escape from Kings Park
description: 4 friends take a trip to an abandoned mental hospital where a mysterious figure terrifies them inside a decrepit building. Is the figure an escaped patient with horrifying mental disturbances, or does their fear make them imagine things?

title: Blood Brother
description: Three young men go backpacking in the red deserts of southern Utah, and complications arise when they are attacked by two people, leaving one dead and the other two to decide whether to go after the killers or back for help.
